texto_apresentação: This application helps you manage your company's stock, making it easier to decide when to add or remove a product, saving time.
texto_objetivo: The main objective of this application is to help manage your company's stock, providing greater control and ease in the decision-making process. In addition, the app can also:
texto_cadastro: Add products to stock and keep an up-to-date record.
texto_controle: Track the stock of your products in real time.
gestao_texto: Manage your stores in different locations with each location's stock.
texto_sugestao: Get suggestions on which products to add in each establishment, in relation to your sales.
digite_email: Enter your registered email to receive a new password
texto_email_enviado: Your new password has been sent to the email address:
